repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:latest 

ENV HOME /config 
ENV APPLE_ID steve@mac.com 

# Install base packages 
RUN apt-get update \  
&& apt-get dist-upgrade -y \
&& apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python-pip git \
&& pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip setuptools && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install icloud_photos_downloader 
RUN cd /usr/src \  
&& git clone https://github.com/chadj/icloud_photos_downloader.git \  
&& cd icloud_photos_downloader \  
&& git pull \  
&& git checkout ckdatabasews \
&& pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

COPY run.sh /usr/bin/run.sh 
RUN chmod +x /usr/bin/run.sh 

VOLUME /photos /config 

ENTRYPOINT /usr/bin/run.sh
